Type.Name: RuntimeArgumentHandle

TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit RuntimeArgumentHandle extends System.ValueType

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

summary.para: A handle that represents a variable-length argument list.

remarks.para: This class has no members. It exists solely to support methods that take a variable number of arguments (such as can be written in C/C++).
